admin_templates.template: <xen:selectunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}]" value="{xen:raw $preparedOption.option_value}" hint="{$preparedOption.hint}" size="10" multiple="true"> <xen:options source="$formatParams" /> <xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

template.title: watched_wiki_update
template.subject: {xen:phrase update_to_watched_page_x, "title={$page.page_name}"}
template.body_html:
{xen:phrase watched_page_update_email_html, 'receiver={$receiver.username}', 'replier={$reply.username}', 'board={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{$page.page_name}
{xen:link canonical:wiki, $page}

{xen:phrase view_this_page_on_the_wiki} {xen:phrase unread_watched_pages}

{xen:phrase watched_page_email_html_footer_1, 'title={$page.page_name}', 'board={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:phrase watched_page_email_html_footer_2, 'watch_link={xen:link canonical:wiki/watch-confirm, $page}', 'manage_link={xen:link canonical:watched/wiki/all}', 'link_style=color: #969696'}

phrases.phrase: Are you sure you wish to delete this archived page?

Are you sure you wish to delete this page?
Child pages will be moved to the parent node.
Are you sure you wish to delete this template?
IP address information for edit by {user}
Page can only be edited by an administrator.
This option limits the number of autolinks per page. (0 to disable, -1 for no limit)

After the allotted time has passed, the cache for that page will be refreshed.
(Accepts PHP strtotime values - Use "now" to disable the cache completely)
If enabled, the family tree will only show the immediate parent and siblings.
If selected, numbers will be prepended to the links for table of contents.
The number of header <h#> tags required to generate a TOC. (0 to disable)
Discussion threads may be created for wiki pages in this forum. (unspecify to disable)
You may choose to disable full WYSIWYG editing in the wiki.
This page has been modified by another user since you initially opened it. Your changes have not been saved. Please reload the page and try again.
Are you sure you wish to revert this archived page?
Selected users will be able to administrate the editor permission masks to this page.
Selected users/usergroups will be able to edit this page, regardless of their usergroup's default editing permissions. They will also be able to edit this page even if it is marked as "protected".
View this Page on the Wiki
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the page {title} at {board} with email notification of new updates.
To stop receiving email, please change your watching options for this page. You may also review all your watched pages.
{receiver}, {replier} updated a page you are watching at {board}.
This wiki contains a total of {total} pages.

The absolute path to the PHP file on server in which you want to use to build this page.
Pages based on PHP files are not cached as they are more suited to dynamic content.
As well, these pages are marked as protected and only editable by wiki administrators.

The creators of XenCarta offer no support for wiki pages generated using PHP files,
and thusly declare zero responsibility for any damage done to your website or server.
Use "0" to leave a page off the index.

[QUOTE][CENTER][SIZE=4]An administrator has deleted this page from the wiki.[/SIZE][/CENTER]
[CENTER][SIZE=6][B]This thread has now been automatically locked.[/B][/SIZE][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
{name} updated the wiki page {title}. There may be more updates after this.
You are watching this page. Use the button below if you would like to stop watching this page.
Are you sure you want to like this wiki?
Are you sure you want to unlike this wiki?
